body:
I noticed that helm3 orphans resource when their namespace is changed.
Basically it fails to delete the resource in the old namespace.
This can by reproduced with a chart that contains a single resource:

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: {{ include "mychart.fullname" . }}
  namespace: {{ default .Release.Namespace .Values.namespace }}
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  ports:
    - port: 80
      targetPort: http
      protocol: TCP
      name: http
```
Install it in the `default` namespace:
```
> helm3 install ns-change helm-diff-reproduce-diff-issue/mychart/ --debug
install.go:148: [debug] Original chart version: ""
install.go:165: [debug] CHART PATH: /Users/d062284/Development/go/src/github.com/databus23/helm-diff/helm-diff-reproduce-diff-issue/mychart

client.go:87: [debug] creating 1 resource(s)
NAME: ns-change
LAST DEPLOYED: Fri Nov  1 15:16:16 2019
NAMESPACE: default
STATUS: deployed
REVISION: 1
TEST SUITE: None
USER-SUPPLIED VALUES:
{}

COMPUTED VALUES:
fullnameOverride: ""
nameOverride: ""
service:
  port: 80

HOOKS:
MANIFEST:
---
# Source: mychart/templates/service.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: ns-change-mychart
  namespace: default
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  ports:
    - port: 80
      targetPort: http
      protocol: TCP
      name: http
```

Upgrade it changing the namespace of the resource:
```
> helm3 upgrade ns-change helm-diff-reproduce-diff-issue/mychart/ --set namespace=kube-monitoring --debug
upgrade.go:79: [debug] preparing upgrade for ns-change
upgrade.go:87: [debug] performing update for ns-change
upgrade.go:225: [debug] creating upgraded release for ns-change
client.go:149: [debug] checking 1 resources for changes
client.go:170: [debug] Created a new Service called "ns-change-mychart"

upgrade.go:94: [debug] updating status for upgraded release for ns-change
Release "ns-change" has been upgraded. Happy Helming!
NAME: ns-change
LAST DEPLOYED: Fri Nov  1 15:16:49 2019
NAMESPACE: default
STATUS: deployed
REVISION: 2
TEST SUITE: None
USER-SUPPLIED VALUES:
namespace: kube-monitoring

COMPUTED VALUES:
fullnameOverride: ""
nameOverride: ""
namespace: kube-monitoring
service:
  port: 80

HOOKS:
MANIFEST:
---
# Source: mychart/templates/service.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: ns-change-mychart
  namespace: kube-monitoring
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  ports:
    - port: 80
      targetPort: http
      protocol: TCP
      name: http
```

And afterwards you have two service in both namespaces:
```
> kubectl get svc --all-namespaces | grep mychart
default             ns-change-mychart                                        ClusterIP      10.180.169.55    <none>         80/TCP                       1m
kube-monitoring     ns-change-mychart                                        ClusterIP      10.180.145.115   <none>         80/TCP                       40
```

The `diff` (shameless plug)  plugin seem to pick this up correctly using (`helm template` and `helm get manifest` under the hood):
```
helm3 diff upgrade ns-change helm-diff-reproduce-diff-issue/mychart/ --set namespace=kube-monitoring
default, ns-change-mychart, Service (v1) has been removed:
- # Source: mychart/templates/service.yaml
- apiVersion: v1
- kind: Service
- metadata:
-   name: ns-change-mychart
-   namespace: default
- spec:
-   type: ClusterIP
-   ports:
-     - port: 80
-       targetPort: http
-       protocol: TCP
-       name: http
+
kube-monitoring, ns-change-mychart, Service (v1) has been added:
-
+ # Source: mychart/templates/service.yaml
+ apiVersion: v1
+ kind: Service
+ metadata:
+   name: ns-change-mychart
+   namespace: kube-monitoring
+ spec:
+   type: ClusterIP
+   ports:
+     - port: 80
+       targetPort: http
+       protocol: TCP
+       name: http
```

Output of `helm version`:
```
version.BuildInfo{Version:"v3.0.0-rc.1", GitCommit:"ee77ae3d40fd599445ebd99b8fc04e2c86ca366c", GitTreeState:"clean", GoVersion:"go1.13.3"}
```
Output of `kubectl version`:
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.3", GitCommit:"2d3c76f9091b6bec110a5e63777c332469e0cba2", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-08-19T11:13:54Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.9", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"darwin/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.2", GitCommit:"f6278300bebbb750328ac16ee6dd3aa7d3549568", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-08-05T09:15:22Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```
Cloud Provider/Platform (AKS, GKE, Minikube etc.): 
`Openstack` (Don't laugh)
